title: Aritzia Is a Fashion-Person Paradiseâ€”These 25 Standouts Are Now On Major Sale
description: The basics alone are worth checking out.
author: Jennifer Camp Forbes
excerpt: The basics alone are worth checking out.
text: Ask just about any fashion person where they get their favorite basics from and more often than not the answer would be Aritzia. It's no surprise why when the retailer has an endless offering of covetable cool-girl picks. Many of these are on major sale right now until August 7 so it's the perfect time to scoop up favorites of your own.I went ahead and rounded up the best finds from the sale below. I made sure to include a selection of dresses, tops, shorts, and some great denim finds from brands like Agolde. Scroll on to shop 25 discounted standouts from the Aritzia sale and thank me later.Shop Chic Aritzia Sale Picks Aritzia The Effortless Pant in Satin This whole look has my attention. Sunday Best Rib Seamless Crew Tank I want this in every color. I told you the sales were major. Wilfred Regal Vest in Crepette Aritzia Accent Solid Brass Leather Slim Belt Instantly elevates a look. The Group Deakins Poplin Short Babaton Dateline Tube Top Sunday Best Idolize Tote Bag Another look I want to re-create. Can you tell I love an Aritzia vest? Stellar everyday outfit idea. Denim Forum Kai Curve-Fit Mid-Rise Baggy Jean Sunday Best Martine Poplin Bubble Dress Aritzia Sorbetto Raffia Bag Wilfred Smooth Matter Botanist Hip Tank How great is this neckline? The pleats make the dress. You can wear this with everything from jeans to skirts. Wilfred Smooth Matter Tower Top Don't sleep on navy pieces.
html:
Ask just about any fashion person where they get their favorite basics from and more often than not the answer would be Aritzia. It's no surprise why when the retailer has an endless offering of covetable cool-girl picks. Many of these are on major sale right now until August 7 so it's the perfect time to scoop up favorites of your own.

I went ahead and rounded up the best finds from the sale below. I made sure to include a selection of dresses, tops, shorts, and some great denim finds from brands like Agolde. Scroll on to shop 25 discounted standouts from the Aritzia sale and thank me later.

Shop Chic Aritzia Sale Picks

Aritzia
